ygData.subject: RE: Order in which to increase skill
ygData.msgSnippet: I know what you mean, but I am at L35 now, and hit 100 and can t get it to move at all (after 1100pp spent and 160 attempts at stalking probes) Read back
ygData.messageBody:
I know what you mean, but I am at L35 now, and hit 100 and can't get it to
move at all (after 1100pp spent and 160 attempts at stalking probes)

Read back through the messages earlier this month, there is apparantly a cap
similar to that of spell research which is (L-15)x5 (just repeating this
since I do not run a caster I have no way of actually knowing this to be
true.

I don't know if I misunderstood what you are saying, but the formula is:

(Level - 15) x 5

So, (18-15) x 5 = 15 skill max

But I feel that my wall is very real.... I will get to L36 sometime in the
near future and try it out.

In the meantime, you are correct in saying that it's only available at
higher levels.....

Vapn Maistre, Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: Susan Earp [mailto:searp@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 1:00 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering
Subject: Fw: [EQ_Tinkering] Order in which to increase skill


From: "Susan Earp" <searp@...>

This doesn't make sense since 18 X 5 = 90. Then, if you add the addition +
5 pts, it makes 95 skill or should. This has to be a bug since this would
make tinkering only available to higher levels. :(

----- Original Message -----
From: Murr Rockstroh <mrockstr@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 11:29 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Order in which to increase skill


> From: "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...>
>
> Don't bother until you are L26 for now....
>
> Seems like there is indeed a skill cap that is (Lvl -15) x 5
>
> So at L18 you can only get to 10 (but you start at 50 skill so you can't
> raise it). You can't start raising it until you hit L26, then you max
would
> be 55.
>
> I am L35 and spent 1100pp trying to raise it 1 stinking point, then I read
> this news group only to find the messages about the skill cap (UGH!!!!)
>
> Vapn, L35 Warrior, Almost Master Tinkerer, Master Fletcher, Povar
